reviews.review_msg: Very intellegent woman, but all over the board (literally) in lectures. she jumps from topic to topic often and doesn't usually pull them all together to form a conclusive point by the end of class. It would be nice if she could wrap everything up at the end of each class so we aren't left scatterbrained and confused.
I loved this teacher. Very approachable. Got him to look over my essay before I handed it in, ended up gettin an A in the class despite getting a low mark on midterm. =) Am waiting to take him again!
